programme.title: The Gold Rush
programme.desc: During the Klondike Gold Rush, a lone prospector goes through a series of misfortunes, including a blizzard and starvation. However, he finds love even in the stormy Alaska.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Keith Michaels, an Oscar-winning writer, teaches at the Binghamton University on the East Coast after losing his popularity in Hollywood and falls in love with Holly, a fellow teacher.

programme.title: Penelope

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: A family moves to a new neighbourhood with their adorable Great Dane, who is notorious for his inadvertent propensity to cause trouble.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace, who is vacationing in Paris with her friends and stepsister, is mistaken for a British heiress. Later, the three women are whisked away to Monte Carlo, where they discover royalty and romance.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Henry falls in love with Lucy, whose short-term memory loss makes her forget him every time she falls asleep. As a result, Henry decides to win her over every day after she wakes up.

programme.title: Mune

programme.title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: After FBI agent Malcolm Turners stepson, Trent, witnesses a murder, the two are forced to go undercover. While Malcolm turns into Big Momma, Trent disguises himself as Charmaine.

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: Maggie, a working single mother, allows Vincent, a hedonistic misanthrope, to babysit her 12-year-old son Oliver. Soon, a beautiful friendship develops between Vincent and Oliver.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: When his new neighbours extravagant Christmas decorations appear, a man feels challenged and initiates a spirited decorating competition.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon and Theodore believe that Dave is going to propose to his girlfriend, Samantha, in Miami. In a bid to retain their place in Daves life, the three set out to stop him.

programme.title: Andar Bahar
programme.desc: Surya, a notorious criminal on the run, happens to meet the cheerful Suhasini, who is terminally ill. Taking pity on her, he decides to marry her and fulfil her lifelong wish.

programme.desc: This is Documentary - Others Category

programme.title: Punjab Ka Singham
programme.desc: DSP Dilsher, a hot-headed policeman, wages a war on the growing drug epidemic in Punjab. Along the way, he locks horns with Bhullar, a corrupt influential man.

programme.title: Yamla Pagla Deewana Phir Se
programme.desc: Brothers Puran and Kala get their hands on an ancient Ayurvedic remedy that cures all illnesses. However, chaos ensues after Kala falls in love with a surgeon named Chiku.

programme.title: Yeh Hai Jalwa
programme.desc: Raj, an orphan, learns that he is actually an Illegitimate son of a successful businessman. As a result, he travels to the United Kingdom to reunite with his father and claim his rightful place.

programme.title: Taarzan: The Wonder Car
programme.desc: Raj revamps his deceased fathers car into a wonderful car named Taarzan and the car comes alive as it is possessed by his fathers spirit. Soon, it also starts killing his fathers murderers.

programme.title: Raja Hindustani
programme.desc: Raja, a taxi driver, falls in love with Aarti, a rich girl and marries her against her parents wishes. Later, her stepmother tries to create differences between the couple.

programme.title: Krishna Cottage
programme.desc: A group of college students are forced to take shelter in the mysterious Krishna Cottage for the night. Little do they know that a spirit haunts the house.

programme.title: Rowdy Rathore
programme.desc: Shivas life takes an unexpected turn when a child mistakes him for her father. Upon learning the truth, Shiva vows to change his ways for the better.

programme.title: King of Kotha
programme.desc: Heartbroken on being back-stabbed by his childhood friend, Raju, an influential man, runs away from his hometown, Kotha. Soon, to bring back order in the town, a police officer plots a plan.

programme.title: Jeans
programme.desc: Madhumita and Vishwanathan fall in love with each other but his father disapproves of the relationship as he wants his twin sons to marry two identical twins.

programme.title: King Of Serpant
programme.desc: A mans small village faces certain death unless he kills a giant python. So, he leads the hunt against the beast to keep his village safe.

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: Tarzan, a feral orphan raised by gorillas, encounters a beautiful woman named Jane. As he grows close to her, he faces a difficult choice between staying with his ape family and rejoining humanity.

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Riley moves to San Francisco, leaving behind her life in Minnesota. She and her five core emotions, Fear, Anger, Joy, Disgust and Sadness, struggle to cope with her new life.

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: A professor wishes to create a new source of energy that will save his college from being shut down. However, he ends up with an extremely bouncy rubber-like substance that helps objects jump higher.

programme.title: Race to Witch Mountain
programme.desc: A cab driver takes the help of a UFO expert in order to protect two children, who have paranormal powers from falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: In Her Shoes
programme.desc: After Maggie is thrown out of the house by her step-mother and has a fallout with her elder sister, she discovers that she has a maternal grandmother.

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: Blu, a domesticated blue macaw, is brought to Rio de Janeiro to meet Jewel, the last known female of his species. However, things take a turn when they are kidnapped by smugglers.

programme.title: The Princess Diaries
programme.desc: An awkward American teens life changes when she learns she is the princess of a small European country and must quickly master the ways of royalty.

programme.title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: A princess faces a new difficulty when her coronation is contained by a cunning archduke sighting the rules that contain her from becoming a queen due to her marital status.

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: A girl disguises as a male warrior and joins the imperial army in order to prevent her sick father from being forced to enlist as he has no male heir.

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: After being exposed to cosmic radiation, four astronauts gain unique powers and must navigate personal tensions while confronting an increasingly dangerous adversary.

programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Mike and Sulley, two monsters, join Monsters University, in order to graduate as the scariest monsters on the planet. Starting off as arch-rivals, they gradually become best friends.

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: Tess and her daughter, Anna, do not get along. However, things take a turn when, in a freak incident, they switch bodies and are forced to live each others lives.

programme.title: Kunlun Battle
programme.desc: A Kunlun gatekeepers son forms an alliance with a powerful man, fuelled by the desire to avenge the betrayal suffered by his father.

programme.title: Pretty Woman
programme.desc: Edward, a business executive, meets a struggling prostitute, Vivian, and hires her to stay with him for a week. However, things take unexpected turns when he falls in love with her.

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: John Keating, a progressive English teacher, tries to encourage his students to break free from the norm, go against the status quo and live life unapologetically.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Clark learns about the source of his abilities and his real home when he enters a Kryptonian ship in the Artic. However, an old enemy follows him to Earth in search of a codex and brings destruction.

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Before Andy leaves for college, his toys are mistakenly delivered to a day care centre. Woody convinces the other toys that they were not dumped and leads them on an expedition back home.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A prince is cursed to live as the Beast until he learns to love. His chance arrives when a spirited young woman, Belle, enters his castle and his enchanted servants help bridge their divide.

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Shane Wolfe, a Navy SEAL, fails to rescue a government scientist, Howard Plummer, from Serbian rebels. Later, he is assigned to protect Plummers children from his enemies.

programme.title: Samson
programme.desc: Samson, a Hebrew with extraordinary strength, must use his God-given gift to rally his people to freedom from the evil Philistines.

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: Logan comes out of retirement to escort a young mutant named Laura to a safe place. He meets with other mutants, who run from an evil corporation that has been experimenting with them, along the way.

programme.title: Shark Island
programme.desc: Four friends in a resort island have to save themselves from genetically modified sharks while trying to find a cure in a nearby research centre.

programme.desc: Fang Shiyu, a martial artist, decides to exact revenge on the corrupt officials who falsefully accuse and frame in a case of corruption.
